networks.Generator.Generator¶

class networks.Generator.Generator(name, bus_id, p_kw, q_kvar, kv, kva, pvfactor, fixed, max_p_kw, min_p_kw, max_q_kvar, min_q_kvar, phases, subtrans_react_pu)¶

Bases: Element

A class representing a generator in a power system network.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – The name of the generator.

  • bus_id (int) – The ID of the bus to which the generator is connected.

  • p_kw (float) – Active power output of the generator in kilowatts (kW).

  • q_kvar (float) – Reactive power output of the generator in kilovolt-amperes reactive (kVAR).

  • kv (float) – Voltage magnitude of the generator in kilovolts (kV).

  • kva (float) – Apparent power rating of the generator in kilovolt-amperes (kVA).

  • pvfactor (float) – Power factor of the generator.

  • fixed (bool) – Whether the generator is fixed or not.

  • max_p_kw (float) – Maximum active power output of the generator in kilowatts (kW).

  • min_p_kw (float) – Minimum active power output of the generator in kilowatts (kW).

  • max_q_kvar (float) – Maximum reactive power output of the generator in kilovolt-amperes reactive (kVAR).

  • min_q_kvar (float) – Minimum reactive power output of the generator in kilovolt-amperes reactive (kVAR).

  • phases (str) – Phases of the generator.

  • subtrans_react_pu (float) – Subtransient reactance of the generator in per unit.

__init__(name, bus_id, p_kw, q_kvar, kv, kva, pvfactor, fixed, max_p_kw, min_p_kw, max_q_kvar, min_q_kvar, phases, subtrans_react_pu)¶

Initializes a Generator object.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – The name of the generator.

  • bus_id (int) – The ID of the bus to which the generator is connected.

  • p_kw (float) – Active power output of the generator in kilowatts (kW).

  • q_kvar (float) – Reactive power output of the generator in kilovolt-amperes reactive (kVAR).

  • kv (float) – Voltage magnitude of the generator in kilovolts (kV).

  • kva (float) – Apparent power rating of the generator in kilovolt-amperes (kVA).

  • pvfactor (float) – Power factor of the generator.

  • fixed (bool) – Whether the generator is fixed or not.

  • max_p_kw (float) – Maximum active power output of the generator in kilowatts (kW).

  • min_p_kw (float) – Minimum active power output of the generator in kilowatts (kW).

  • max_q_kvar (float) – Maximum reactive power output of the generator in kilovolt-amperes reactive (kVAR).

  • min_q_kvar (float) – Minimum reactive power output of the generator in kilovolt-amperes reactive (kVAR).

  • phases (str) – Phases of the generator.

  • subtrans_react_pu (float) – Subtransient reactance of the generator in per unit.
